vsph.clientCommon.loginPage.formDescription: Log into your account in application using the form below or select alternatives.

errors.required: Username or email address is required.

rememberAccount.info: If this checkbox is selected, your account will be saved in on My Account page.

vsph.clientCommon.loginPage.qrDescription: Log into the application using the QR code scanned in the mobile app.
vsph.clientCommon.loginPage.dontHaveAccount: You dont't have an account yet?

vsph.clientCommon.myAccountsPage.formDescription: Below you will find all your remembered accounts for the application. You can delete any remembered account from memory. To log into a remembered account you still need a password.

errors.required: Username or email address is required.
errors.exist: Username or email address is already saved.

remove.paragraph: Are you sure to delete saved account with login {accountLogin}? Operation cannot be undone.

removeAll.paragraph: Are you sure to delete all {accountsCount} saved accounts? Operation cannot be undone.

login.proceedNotVerified: Proceed log in on unknow account
login.proceedVerified: Proceed log in on verified account

vsph.clientCommon.myAccountsPage.noAccountsMessage: It looks like you haven't added any accounts yet. Log in or add an account manually.

snackbars.addNewMySavedAccount: Successfully added new account to your saved accounts list.
snackbars.removeMySavedAccount: Successfully removed account from yours saved accounts.
snackbars.removeAllMySavedAccounts: Successfully removed all yours saved accounts.

vsph.clientCommon.mfaPage.formDescription: Confirm your identity using the multi-factor Authenticator app.

qrcode.paragraph: Scan the QR-code or enter the authenticator sercret code with Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator app.

confirm.paragraph: Copy and save this code in a safe place in case you lose access to the Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator app.
confirm.infoBlock: Make sure to save the 32-digit key. It will help you restore access to your account if you lose your device. To keep your account secure, do not share this key.

code.paragraph: Insert code from authenticator app to sync connection between your authenticator device and Visphere account.

vsph.clientCommon.mfaPage.dontHaveAccessToAuthenticator: I don't have access to verify via Authenticator app.

vsph.clientCommon.mfaEmailPage.formDescription: Confirm your identity using the one-time password sending via email message.

vsph.clientCommon.fillDataPage.formDescription: To complete sign up in the application using an external provider, enter additional personal informations.

errors.minlength: Username must have at least 3 characters.
errors.pattern: Username can including only small letters, digits and followind characters: '-' and '_'.

errors.minlength: First name must have at least 2 characters.
Last name must have at least 2 characters.

errors.notAll: Birth date must be filled with month, day and year.
errors.inappropriateAge: It is required to be at least 13 years old to create an account.

allowNotifs.value: I want to send email notifications about new updates, changes and special offers. You can decline at any time.

errors.required: You need to agree to our terms of service to continue.

init.title: Visphere application settings
init.paragraph1: On this page you can set the most important parameters of your account, application theme or displayed language. You can get more information about the application get by clicking on button below.
init.paragraph2: Need a version for your computer or phone? Click on the button below to go to the download page.

errors.minlength: First name must have at least 2 characters.
Last name must have at least 2 characters.
Username must have at least 3 characters.
errors.pattern: Username can including only small letters, digits and followind characters: '-' and '_'.

errors.exist: Account with following email already exist.

emailAddress.info: Provided second email address is only for marketing informations.

errors.exact: Second email address must be different than primary email address.

deleteSecondEmailAddress.description: Are you sure you want to delete second email address? Once deleted, all emails (including marketing) will be placed at your primary email address.

errors.notAll: Birth date must be filled with month, day and year.
errors.inappropriateAge: It is required to be at least 13 years old to create an account.

errors.pattern: New password must have at least 8 characters, one big and small letter, one digit and one special character.

errors.mismatch: Confirmed new password and new password must be the same.

modal.successfullSendEmailMessage: If mailbox with provided email address exist, we send verifiction email on this mailbox.

relateSettings.label: Relate theme settings with your account
relateSettings.description: If you check this option, theme settings be assigned to your account.

pushNotifications.label: Enable/disable notifications
pushNotifications.description: If you select this option, the app will display push notifications.

pushNotificationsSound.label: Enable/disable notifications sound effect
pushNotificationsSound.description: If you check this option, notifications displayed in the app will be accompanied by an sound.

relateSettings.label: Relate language settings with your account
relateSettings.description: If you check this option, language settings be assigned to your account.

logout.paragraph: Are you sure to logout from application?

vsph.clientCommon.forAll.functionEnabledOnLocal: Selected options is currently supported only for local accounts.
